about_the_game:
The upgraded and new Stella Gear usable in “Relayer Advanced”.
Players can gain advantage in battle by using this ultra-high performance Stella Gear exclusively for Mars: the one with the will of Mars.

【Available items】
・Neo Mars NEXT
・Mars's battle data + (custom chip)

＊This is a separately sold "Neo Mars NEXT" product.
＊"SEASON PASS" which includes this product is also available. Please be careful not to purchase duplicate products.
＊To use this content, the main game product (sold separately) is required. Also, if players need to apply the latest patch, please use this content after updating.

Players can get Mars’s exclusive new Stella Gear "Neo Mars NEXT" and the custom chip, " Mars's battle data +".
This new Stella Gear can be used by going to "Training" > "Hangar" > "Switch" menu after Mars joins the team in the game.

＊DLC Stellar Gear have higher stats and exclusive custom bonuses that make them more powerful than even the standard models that are upgraded to the maximum level.
＊DLC Stellar Gear cannot be upgraded.

name: Relayer Advanced - Mars's Neo Mars NEXT

package_groups.name: default

package_groups.title: Buy Relayer Advanced - Mars's Neo Mars NEXT

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5-6402P
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 compatible soundcard
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5-7600K
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1080
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 compatible soundcard

short_description: The next-generation Stella Gear "Neo Mars NEXT" exclusively for Mars is now available. Defeat the Relayer forces with a fully customized Stella Gear and a custom chip bearing the name of Mars!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Traditional Chinese, Japanese*, Korean
*languages with full audio support
